013package org.apache.juneau.encoders;
014
015import java.io.*;
016import java.util.zip.*;
017
018/**
019 * Encoder for handling <js>"gzip"</js> encoding and decoding.
020 *
021 * <ul class='notes'>
022 *    <li class='note'>This class is thread safe and reusable.
023 * </ul>
024 *
025 * <ul class='seealso'>
026 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-marshall.jm.Encoders">Encoders</a>
027
028 * </ul>
029 */
030public class GzipEncoder extends Encoder {
031
032   @Override /* Encoder */
033   public OutputStream getOutputStream(OutputStream os) throws IOException {
034      return new FinishableGZIPOutputStream(os);
035   }
036
037   @Override /* Encoder */
038   public InputStream getInputStream(InputStream is) throws IOException {
039      return new GZIPInputStream(is);
040   }
041
042   /**
043    * Returns <code>[<js>"gzip"</js>]</code>.
044    */
045   @Override /* Encoder */
046   public String[] getCodings() {
047      return new String[]{"gzip"};
048   }
049
050   private static class FinishableGZIPOutputStream extends GZIPOutputStream implements Finishable {
051      FinishableGZIPOutputStream(OutputStream out) throws IOException {
052         super(out);
053      }
054   }
055}
